localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Elza browser is not a replacement for your web browser but a powerful tool when you would like to keep your browsing private. Elza is always on incognito with an option to turn on Tor which runs much faster than even the Tor Browser. #Minimal #Fast #Private
blogPost.body: Elza browser is not a replacement for your web browser but a powerful tool when you would like to keep your browsing private. Elza is always on incognito with an option to turn on Tor which runs much faster than even the Tor Browser. #Minimal #Fast #Private
blogPost.title: Elza Browser - Fast, private, and minimal web browser.
blogPost.author: Nitin Sudhakar

localize.description: ELZA浏览器不是您的Web浏览器的替代品，而是当您想要保持您的浏览隐私时的一个功能强大的工具。Elza总是隐姓埋名，可以选择打开Tor，它的运行速度甚至比Tor浏览器都快得多。#最小值 #快速 #私有
localize.tagline: 快速、私密且最小的Web浏览器。

localize.description: ELZA瀏覽器不是您的Web瀏覽器的替代品，而是當您想要保持您的瀏覽隱私時的一個功能強大的工具。Elza總是隱姓埋名，可以選擇打開Tor，它的運行速度甚至比Tor瀏覽器都快得多。#最小值 #快速 #私有
localize.tagline: 快速、私密且最小的Web瀏覽器。

previous.excerpt: Make Writing a Habit. Write for at least 10 minutes a day for the next 90 days. Tweet your progress each day with the #90DaysOfProse hashtag.
previous.title: #90DaysOfProse - Make writing a habit

localize.description: 让写作成为一种习惯。在接下来的90天里，每天至少写10分钟。每天用#90DaysOfProse 标签推特你的进展。
讓寫作成爲一種習慣。在接下來的90天裏，每天至少寫10分鐘。每天用#90DaysOfProse 標籤推特你的進展。

next.excerpt: Daily-curated Remote Jobs for Everyone Features: - simple list (Hacker News style) - simple & fast search powered by Algolia - only the latest jobs from the last 30 days - no long descriptions, just simple titles and links - no ads - simple email newsletter
next.title: Remotelane 3.0 - Remote jobs for everyone with the most simple ux and search

localize.description: 每日-为每个人策划的远程工作功能：-简单列表(黑客新闻风格)-由Algolia提供支持的简单快速搜索-仅限过去30天的最新工作-没有详细描述，只有简单的标题和链接-没有广告-简单的电子邮件时事通讯
localize.tagline: 通过最简单的用户体验和搜索，为每个人提供远程作业

localize.description: 每日-爲每個人策劃的遠程工作功能：-簡單列表(黑客新聞風格)-由Algolia提供支持的簡單快速搜索-僅限過去30天的最新工作-沒有詳細描述，只有簡單的標題和鏈接-沒有廣告-簡單的電子郵件時事通訊
localize.tagline: 通過最簡單的用戶體驗和搜索，爲每個人提供遠程作業
